verses.verse: Now gather <WH1413> yourself in troops <WH1416>, O daughter <WH1323> of troops <WH1416>: he has laid <WH7760> siege <WH4692> against us <WH5221>: they shall strike the judge <WH8199> of Israel <WH3478> with a rod <WH7626> upon the cheek <WH3895>.

But you <WH1035>, Bethâ€“lehem Ephratah <WH672>, though you be little <WH6810> among the thousands <WH505> of Judah <WH3063>, yet out of you shall he come forth <WH3318> unto me that is to be ruler <WH4910> in Israel <WH3478>; whose goings forth <WH4163> have been from of old <WH6924>, from everlasting <WH3117>.

Therefore will he give them up <WH5414>, until the time <WH6256> that she which travails <WH3205> has brought forth <WH3205>: then the remnant <WH3499> of his brothers <WH251> shall return <WH7725> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And he shall stand <WH5975> and shepherd <WH7462> in the strength <WH5797> of the Lord <WH3068>, in the majesty <WH1347> of the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> his God <WH430>; and they shall stay <WH3427>: for now shall he be great <WH1431> unto the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>.

And this man shall be the peace <WH7965>, when the Assyrian <WH804> shall come <WH935> into our land <WH776>: and when he shall tread <WH1869> in our palaces <WH759>, then shall we raise <WH6965> against him seven <WH7651> shepherds <WH7462>, and eight <WH8083> principal <WH5257> men <WH120>.

And they shall waste <WH7462> the land <WH776> of Assyria <WH804> with the sword <WH2719>, and the land <WH776> of Nimrod <WH5248> in the entrances <WH6607> there <WH5337>: thus shall he deliver us from the Assyrian <WH804>, when he comes <WH935> into our land <WH776>, and when he treads <WH1869> inside our borders <WH1366>.

And the remnant <WH7611> of Jacob <WH3290> shall be in the midst <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a dew <WH2919> from the Lord <WH3068>, as the showers <WH7241> upon the grass <WH6212>, that waits <WH6960> not for man <WH376>, nor waits <WH3176> for the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.

And the remnant <WH7611> of Jacob <WH3290> shall be among the Nations <WH1471> in the midst <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a lion <WH738> among the animals <WH929> of the forest <WH3293>, as a young lion <WH3715> among the flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629>: who <WH5674>, if he go through, both treads down <WH7429>, and tears in pieces <WH2963>, and none can deliver <WH5337>.
Your hand <WH3027> shall be lifted up <WH7311> upon your adversaries <WH6862>, and all your enemies <WH341> shall be cut off <WH3772>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>, that I will cut off <WH3772> your horses <WH5483> out of the midst <WH7130> of you <WH6>, and I will destroy your chariots <WH4818>:
And I will cut off <WH3772> the cities <WH6145> of your land <WH776>, and throw down <WH2040> all your strong holds <WH4013>:
And I will cut off <WH3772> witchcrafts <WH3785> out of your hand <WH3027>; and you shall have no more soothsayers <WH6049>:

Your engraved images <WH6456> also will I cut off <WH3772>, and your standing images <WH4676> out of the midst <WH7130> of you <WH7812>; and you shall no more worship the work <WH4639> of your hands <WH3027>.
And I will pluck up <WH5428> your groves <WH842> out of the midst <WH7130> of you <WH8045>: so will I destroy your cities <WH6145>.
And I will execute <WH6213> vengeance <WH5359> in anger <WH639> and fury <WH2534> upon the heathen <WH1471>, such as they have not heard <WH8085>.
